column4: QUESTION:ubuntu not running , after power cut off ,,its saying at startup  failed to mount /proc and /sys no such file system ...help!!!!!!!!!!
i'd boot to livecd and fsck the partitions
omgubuntu have a review of it as well as a ppa
use software centre
can you give the output of: sudo apt-get update     use a pastebin to host
ok you see the long Hex key on the end of the lines at the bottom of the pastebin?
run: sudo apt-key adv --recv-key --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com         but add each of those codes to the end
if you can rerun the apt-get update command I'll give you a huge command to import the keys you need
looks great :)
no worries, you NEED to add the keys for repos you add or you will get that error
its not essential, just really annoying
sudo apt-get install virtualbox-ose-dkms
recordmydesktop
if you run:  lsusb; lsb_release -a    can you pastebin the output please...
